name: LuciferMovie_Bot
description: Super Fast Telegram Auto Filter Bot

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://youtu.be/5eEsvLAKVc0 or @MT_MytelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://youtu.be/5eEsvLAKVc0 or @MT_MytelegramOrg_Bot

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space. @MT_ID_Bot

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

FORCES_SUB.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

START_MSG.description: Welcome message for start command More Information Check Readme.md

AUTH_GROUPS.description: ID of groups which bot should work as autofilter, bot can only work in thease groups. If not given , bot can be used in any group.

SPELL_MODE_TEXT.description: Seplling Mode Text For More Info Check Readme.md

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Log Channel Use Private Channel Id -100×××× from @MT_ID_Bot

SUPPORT.description: Your Group Link Private or Public Link (with t.me or https://t.me)
